li.label: morphed
li.description: I'm... a cat? No, don't pet me. I do have claws and I will cut you.

li.label: morphed
li.description: Cat? I'm a kitty cat! And I dance dance dance, and I dance dance dance.

li.label: morphed
li.description: The world is too detailed and so bright. I keep cutting myself with these damn claws.

li.label: morphed
li.description: Wow, the world looks so sharp, and these claws are sharp too! Imagine if I could look into all the small places on all fours!

li.label: reverted
li.description: I'm back to my normal, human self again! No more fur or claws.

li.label: reverted
li.description: Aw man, but I was really enjoying threatening to claw people.

li.label: reverted
li.description: No more claws! Finally, I'll stop accidentally stabbing myself.

li.label: reverted
li.description: I'm human again? I think I wanted the opposite of this.

li.label: Cat face
li.description: My jaw doesn't feel right...

li.label: Cat face
li.description: I have whiskers now!? Nyan!

li.label: Cat face
li.description: Great, a face not even a mother could love.

li.label: Cat ears
li.description: These new ears look strange, but at least I can hear well enough.

li.label: Cat ears
li.description: I can hear everything, even the tiniest rodents!

li.label: Cat ears
li.description: I hear too much! Make the noise stop!

li.label: Cat tail
li.description: This tail keeps getting in the way, but it's good for balance.

li.label: Cat tail
li.description: Aww! It's so cute!

li.label: Cat tail
li.description: I keep tripping over this stupid tail!

li.label: Claws
li.description: Yowtch! Poked myself again.

li.label: Claws
li.description: Claws are so useful, I'll never need a knife again!

li.label: Claws
li.description: I keep poking holes in my clothes with these unruly claws!

li.label: Cat eyes
li.description: My eyes feel strange, but I can see better than I ever could before.

li.label: Cat eyes
li.description: I can see in the dark better than ever, and my eyes look so mysterious!

li.label: Cat eyes
li.description: These slit pupils make me look unnatural.
